title: Does using a custom skin get you banned ?
body:
i am asking this question to someone who really knows this subject like a rioter or someone like that . i would like to know if  using a custom skin (only on your screen) will get you banned or not ? if it depends , which apps are not forbidden ? 
  please answer me seriously , thank you .

replies.body: We don't support any third party programs or modifications, and doing so can be at your own risk.  We wouldn't be able to provide support if something with your files become corrupt.  We also can't be sure of any hidden malicious content in a program you download.  Our stance on third parties can be found [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications).  Hope that helps clear things up!

I know i am not from riot, but i can help you.

No, custom skins are NOT bannable. It doesnt affect any other players gameplay, thus it should not be a problem. I personally use Wooxy, which has a great selection of map skins, champion skins, HUD's, and much more. 

Hope this helps!
